page.title: 17MY HOME
page.content:
My house is semi-detached. It has three bedrooms, a lounge, a kitchen, a bathroom and an extra toilet outside. It also has a conservatory. My house is quite old. It is in the main village street in Okeford Fitzpaine and is a listed building. There are four of us in my family, my mum, my dad, my sister and me. I have a pet hamster and he lives in the conservatory. My mum lets me play with him there but she doesn't like him in the rest of the house.
Outside we have a garden.There are two sheds in the garden and a garage.We also have a greenhouse.
